hasValues.title: Values given
hasValues.body: If you want to change base map or geo code you have to remove all values in the 2nd column first.

customBuckets.title: Custom borders
customBuckets.body: Some values in data table are not covered by custom borders.

numberBucketsExceedsDataSet.title: Number buckets
numberBucketsExceedsDataSet.body: Number of buckets exceeds the number of different values in data table.

numberCategoriesOutOfColorScale.title: Color scale
numberCategoriesOutOfColorScale.body: The number of categories exceeds the number of available colors in color scale

numberBucketsOutOfColorScale.title: Color scale
numberBucketsOutOfColorScale.body: The number of buckets exceeds the number of available colors in chosen color scale

unsupportedValuesForType.title: Unsupported values
unsupportedValuesForType.body: All values have to be numerical (or empty) in order to create a numerical choropleth map.

moreThanTwoColumns.title: Data contains too many columns
moreThanTwoColumns.body: Only the first two columns are taken into account, other columns will be ignored

notifications.Der Titel bringt die Kernaussage der Gra: The title brings the core message of the graphic to the point.
notifications.Der Untertitel benennt pr√§zise, was in: The subtitle names precisely what can be seen in the graphic, including units.
